creator: leoking20@gmail.com
text:
I have looked everywhere but no success.
We are in the planning stage, and will be purchasing an applicaiton written in .net 4.0 / WPF /XBAP technoloy which needs to be load tested before implementation. We being HP shop concluded that HP Load runner in not compatible testing such technology. Can you help me find resources that says Jmeter can test such application?. 

Unfortunately I dont have access to application otherwise I would have tested myself to see. 

I am aware this might not be the right place to pose this question but any help from you will be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance, 
Regards,
LK.

Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please subscribe to the JMeter user list and ask there:

http://jakarta.apache.org/site/mail.html
creator: sebb@apache.org
